page.shortlink: ux list builder jsruntime properties onBeforeSelect

discussion.p: The *[js:onBeforeSelect]* event can be used to prevent the user from selecting a row in the List control. If the event returns false, the user is prevented from selecting another row in the List. You can get the zero based index of the row the user is trying to select by referring to *[js:arguments[0]]* in your code.
